entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
